title: Poster, 1967–68
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed: Right center along edge:  A. Hofmann/ Photo:  Mathys/ Wassermann AG
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: The poster design consists of a large black and white photographic image of a close up of two elderly men's faces with emphasis on the features, against a white background.  Above this image on the right, between two ruled red lines, the text reads: Während der Saison 1967-68 finden Sie an dieser Stelle den Spielplan. / Der Saisonprospekt ist erschienen; er orientiert Sie / über den Spielplan, das Ensemble und die / günstigen Abonnements.  In the center of the poster in red is the logo of the Stadt Theater of Basel.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, 1967–68.
1967–68. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-149.
